# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily productivity and satisfaction. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly above $150. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $200. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to maximize its benefits. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
